chapter_description.p: The MEX (MATLAB Executable) module allows C/C++ code to interface with Nelson, extending its functionality and enabling access to Nelsonâ€™s engine, variables, and functions.

keyword.name: engEvalString
keyword.description: Evaluate expression in string in base scope

keyword.name: engGetVariable
keyword.description: Copy variable from Nelson engine workspace

keyword.name: engGetVisible
keyword.description: Determine visibility of Nelson engine session

keyword.name: engOpenSingleUse
keyword.description: Start Nelson engine session for single and nonshared use.

keyword.name: engOutputBuffer
keyword.description: Specify char buffer for Nelson output

keyword.name: engPutVariable
keyword.description: Put variable into Nelson engine workspace

keyword.name: engSetVisible
keyword.description: Show or hide Nelson engine session

keyword.name: mexAtExit
keyword.description: Register a function to be called when the MEX-file is cleared or when Nelson exits

keyword.name: mexCallMATLABWithTrap
keyword.description: Call a NELSON function and capture error.
